about_the_game:
Prepare a meal for the Vietnamese Lunar New Year dinner. But hurry, your guests are arriving soon! A short hand-drawn experience full of delicious surprises.

TET is a fresh and colorful cooking game. Enter the world of delicious Vietnamese food through a series of mini games. Cut the tofu, wash the cabbage, delicately roll the spring rolls, and discover the secrets of the tasty recipes.

TET was created by Charlotte Broccard, a Swiss-Vietnamese illustrator and game designer, with the desire to share her cultural heritage. With special thanks to game developers Etienne Frank, Guillaume Mezino, Mario von Rickenbach, and Michael Frei for their support.

Initiated at ECAL, University of Art and Design Lausanne.

TET was created by Charlotte Broccard, a Swiss-Vietnamese illustrator and game designer, with the desire to share her cultural heritage. With special thanks to game developers Etienne Frank, Guillaume Mezino, Mario von Rickenbach, and Michael Frei for their support.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel i5/i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with shader model 4.0 capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel i5/i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with shader model 4.0 capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: TET

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5/i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
